content: 4 x+6 chain 3 tc in same st as join tc across 4 x+7 chain 1 single_crochet in same st single_crochet across turn work 4 x+8 chain 3 tc in same st as join tc across 4 x+9 chain 1 single_crochet in same st single_crochet across turn work 4 finish off weave in ends assembly attach 2 buttons in the first section of single crochets i used 20mm buttons if you happen to have a 3d printer you can print them i modeled and printed these to use for mine https //www thingiverse com/thing 6980173 sew the harness loop to the second section of single crochets sew it so that the loop hangs in front of where your genitals sit when the belt is worn use the sections of triple crochets as button holes so that the belt is comfortable and stays put put the penis through the loop so that the loop sits between the penis and testicles customization notes if you want to make the penis larger you can add additional row of single_crochet past row 22 to make it longer additionally you can also make it girthier by adding in additional increases to row 4 of the penis pattern when making the head if you want to make the testicles larger you can increase the initial chain length though you will have to do the math on your own for where to do the 2 decreases in every other row the decreases should fall in the middle of the front and back of the piece the seam will rotate a bit as it goes up you will need to decrease enough so that the last row matches the number of stitches in the shaft of the penis while keeping the length of the testicles at least a couple row shorter than the penis which means you may need to omit some of the row of just single crochets alternatively you can use a thicker weight of yarn or a larger crochet hook while following the same pattern
